website_summaries.verdict: Titanium and brushed chrome gives this fan a sharp industrial look.
pros: Fan looks sharp and does its job by moving a lot of air
Simple installation and a good value
cons: Customers have complained that the fan is too wobbly

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk
customer_reviews.text: Just was able to get this installed. Real garbage. The remote is a large wall mount unit that looks like its from the 1970’s. The fan won’t start unless I spin the blades first (think 1920’s biplane). Once it’s finally spinning its so out of balance and something in the motor housing is rubbing. No way to access it to see if it’s curable. Unfortunately, my return window closed before I could put in a return request. Going to replace it with a quality fan and throw this in the trash can. Lesson learned, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk2156

customer_reviews.title: It is good at what it's  meant for.  Love it!  Hope you like my comments.
customer_reviews.text: Hey, I don't know what to say about a fan review. I like it. It's very, very industrial. I'll buy it again. I bought it myself. If you like a cool warehouse look, and a lot of wind, it will work for you! My fiance can't take stuffy air nor heat. Toupees and weaves beware!! So, not a nursery item. But it does as instructed. And doesn't need a lot of balancing. But order the short pole attachment if you have less than 10 foot ceilings. You will get hurt hitting those blades!
customer_reviews.author: Just Khi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan. Sleek and simple
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan. Sleek and simple....however my major disappointment is that it makes a VERY loud "whoop whoop whoop" sound even on the slowest/lowest setting. You would think that maybe I got a "bad" fan...because of the very loud sound that it makes...but I bought two fans of the exact make and model and both make the same noise. One fan is inside a workshop area 10' x 30'. The other fan is outside on porch area in a 10' x 20' area. I had a professional electrician mount and connect them...so we can't blame an amateur installation. Any way...pretty fan...but loud...and I would NOT repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Denton Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Loft look ceiling fan
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this fan. Used in a residential setting; very fortunate to have very high ceilings. Believe this fan could remove some fingers if someone was silly enough to put them in front of moving blades. The fan comes with an electrical control switch, about the size of a Volkswagen. Definitley get something else. The fan is fairly inefficent as far as moving a lot of air; not too important to me. Lacks lighting; also not important to me. Easy to assemble and install. The fit of the ceiling cover cone is a bit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: LDP - Denver

customer_reviews.title: Part missing!
customer_reviews.text: One of the parts was missing. So big, it’s pain the neck to return!!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Already happy from these
customer_reviews.text: Truthfully I haven't taken these out of the box yet, I ordered 5 for our new office. I do have 2 of these at my house, and I love them. they are modernized from the old nasty gold & brown ones. Crisp and clean looking, and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: O.B.#1

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Remote too Bulky for the wall picture not clear thought it included a light and it’s extremely loud’
customer_reviews.author: reviviva l thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: In love with my fan❤ gives off such a great breeze in my shop... def exactly what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: KandiQ

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for an sturdy outdoor fan
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an sturdy outdoor fan. Unfortunately, it wasn't until I installed it and checked with manufacturer that I found out it wasn't an outdoor fan. Problem with Amazon's "search" standards are they give you as much as possible even if it doesn't fit exactly to maximize the sale.
customer_reviews.author: David Busacca

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a really good price compared to other sites and compared to Amazon over the last year. Having said that it's awesome after you get a newer model of remote control. I think it would be scary in a house with ceilings less than 12'
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: very disappointed. The best thing is the industrial look
customer_reviews.text: Nearly no wind, very disappointed. The best thing is the industrial look. Would never buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fans
customer_reviews.text: I love them, I like air distribution. Their very simple, just what I wanted. This is the second time I order fan from this vendor, I love the customer service, it almost looks like the minuite I place the order, they ship. I get the product right a way.
customer_reviews.author: Nelida Reyes

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. It's unbalanced and a loud motor...
customer_reviews.author: DWR

customer_reviews.title: great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: great quality for price .looks great installed.control is big but okay. the many speed selections are nice. it hums at low speeds which is annoying if you are nearby and no other sounds in room. it is in a shop so don't notice too much but would not be tolerable in a bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a winner for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This fan is a definite value for the price. It does wobble occasionally on lower speed, but overall a great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Y.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the house cool and it looks good too
customer_reviews.text: This pushes a lot of air, Keeps the house cool and it looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: trent

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and works well
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my workout building. Looks good and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Peacock Adams

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hardy no air but is is mounted 17 foot up
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Control is too large
customer_reviews.text: The controller that comes with this fan is huge! It's bigger than a standard switch box and the controls look like they come from the 1960's.
customer_reviews.author: D. Riegel

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: Want to buy for every room!! Use in living area. Awesome fan!!
customer_reviews.author: itsme

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I anticipated and the blades are also black. The picture shows silver blades.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fan, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fan, easy installation. Spent more $ on the wiring than the fan cost. Will buy another one, looks great in my garage.
customer_reviews.author: Mark F.

customer_reviews.title: Good fan - poor controller.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fan for the price. Works and looks good in the garage. The included speed controller is huge and hugely dissapointing, in that it offers speeds from fast to supersonic. I had to buy a KB Electronics 8811006 controller to obtain an actual low speed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: THE FAN SEE NICE, EASY TO INSTALL AND GOOD PRICE
customer_reviews.author: Sandra E. Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Great value fan
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but is a little loud when going on high.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: had to return it you can't put it flush to ...
customer_reviews.text: had to return it you can't put it flush to the ceiling has to use the 2 foot extension. bummer
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Lyn Gregoire

customer_reviews.title: The fan only goes extremely fast and comes with very ...
customer_reviews.text: The fan only goes extremely fast and comes with very outdated box to put on the wall. I am not sure how this got high reviews. I sent the second one back and if this was not already installed, I would have sent this back too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better description needed.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't see in the description where it said the fan couldn't be mounted on a vaulted ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fan for Shops and Outdoor Structures
customer_reviews.text: This fan is easy to install, comes with a control and moves a ton of air. It's a little noisier than your average fan but I put one in my shop and one of my boat dock, and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Hayer Baler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fan for the price. Great looking and works well. Nice and industrial looking yest durable.
customer_reviews.author: lee formolo

product_meta.title: Craftmade UT56TBC3M Utility 56" Ceiling Fan with Wall Control, 3 Steel Blades, Titanium and Brushed Chrome
product_meta.description: Color:Brushed ChromeThe Craftmade UT56TBC3M Bristol collection 56" indoor ceiling fan (with wall control) in Brushed Chrome brings Contemporary style. This fan includes Three, Titanium Blades and the hanging height is 19". The voltage is 120 volts. Additional Information: Control - Five-speed wall control; Downrod - Includes 12" Downrod
feature_bullets: UTILITY CEILING FAN DIMENSIONS: Diameter: 56"; Height: 19" (From Ceiling to Bottom of Fan Housing, Includes 12" Downrod); Weight 12.743lbs.
FAN BLADES: 3 Titanium Steel Blades (56" Span / 9° Blade Pitch); CFM: 3852
FAN CONTROL: Includes 5 Speed Non-Reversing Rotary Wall Control

INSTALLATION: Installable on Flat Ceiling with Included Hardware and on Sloped Ceilings up to 23°, Use Part SA130 for 23° to 45° Ceilings with Vaulted Canopy Included; UL Approved for INDOOR Locations
DETAILS: Constructed of Cold Rolled Steel with Brushed Chrome Finish with Titanium Accents

specifications.Warranty Description: 15 year warranty. Contact customer service at 800-527-1292 for parts or warranty details.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars46 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
